config_description: /** * Database setting OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES (default: true). * Optimize expressions of the form (SELECT A) to A. */
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES is used to optimize expressions of the form (SELECT A) to A in the code. When the configuration is enabled, the optimization logic is triggered to simplify the query.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES is triggered whenever the condition 'outerResolvers != null && session.getDatabase().getSettings().optimizeSimpleSingleRowSubqueries' is met in the code. The frequency of triggering depends on the presence of outer resolvers and the database settings.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: Enabling the configuration OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES can have a positive impact on the system performance by simplifying single row subqueries. This optimization can reduce the complexity of queries and improve query execution speed.
